select TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(board_no, 2)) AS board_no , board_title , user_id as board_writer , count , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" from board b join member on(BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) where b.status = 'Y' order by board_no desc
select board_no , board_writer , board_title , board_content , create_date , count , tag from board where board_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and status = 'Y' and board_type = 1
select tboard_no , user_no , tboard_title , tboard_content , create_date , count , tag from t_board where tboard_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and status = 'Y'

select count(*) from board b join member on (board_writer = user_no) where b.status = 'Y'

select TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(board_no, 2)) AS board_no , board_title , user_id as board_writer , count , create_date from board b join member on (board_writer = user_no) where b.status = 'Y'
and board_title
and board_content

select * from(select board_no, board_title, tag, count, (select count(*) from likes l where b.board_no = l.board_no) likes, (select count(*) from reply r where b.board_no = r.board_no) reply from board b where count > 0 and status = 'Y' and board_type = 1 order by likes desc, count desc ) where rownum between 1 and 10

select * from ( select tboard_no , user_no , tboard_title , tboard_content , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as create_date from t_board where status = 'Y' order by create_date desc ) where rownum between 1 and 3

select TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(board_no, 2)) AS "BOARD_NO" , BOARD_WRITER , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , CREATE_DATE , COUNT , TAG , BOARD_TYPE from board b join member on (board_writer = user_no) where user_no = #{mno} and b.status = 'Y' order by board_no desc

select TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(tboard_no, 2)) AS "tboard_no" , user_no , tboard_title , thumbnail , create_date , count from t_board t join member using (user_no) where user_no = 2 and t.status = 'Y' order by tboard_no desc
select count(*) from t_board where status = 'Y'
